argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | f1rhm0to0.a | |- A = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | f1rhm0to0.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | f1rhm0to0.n | |- N = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 4 |  | f1rhm0to0.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_rimrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_rimf1o | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_f1of1 | |- ( F : A -1-1-onto-> B -> F : A -1-1-> B ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F : A -1-1-> B ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_jca | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_anim1i | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B ) /\ X e. A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) <-> ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B ) /\ X e. A ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_f1rhm0to0 | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N <-> X = .0. ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N <-> X = .0. ) ) |
